December 18, 1980
Mr. George Vend©rhof
U*S, Department of Commerce
Washington 25, B.C.
Bear George*
It ms a delight and a pleasure saying hello to you
during the meeting of the Broadcast Advisory Council with
Secretary Sawyer*
I am enclosing herewith a list of the member stations
of the national Association of Educational Broadcasters,
and 1 would fee deeply appreciative if you would place all
of them on your mailing list to receive regular releases
from the Department of Commerce.
With all best wishes, I am
Cordially yours.
Seymour I• Siegel
President, MAE8
